meanings.definition: A shortened or condensed version of a written work.
meanings.sent1: The abridgement of the novel made it easier to read.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the abridgement of the play because it's shorter.
meanings.sent3: The abridgement of the story was so brief, it felt like a summary.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was like an abridgement of a long book, cutting out unnecessary details.
meanings.sent5: The abridgement of the textbook was so well done, I understood the main points easily.

meanings.definition: The act of reducing or shortening something, such as a text or speech.
meanings.sent1: The abridgement of the movie made it more enjoyable to watch.
meanings.sent2: His abridgement of the report saved us a lot of time.
meanings.sent3: The abridgement of the meeting was unexpected but appreciated by all.
meanings.sent4: Her explanation was like an abridgement, getting straight to the point.
meanings.sent5: The abridgement of the recipe made it quick and easy to follow.
